rules_text:
Whenever this creature transforms into Eldigan, Mystletainn's Wielder, destroy another target creature with power 3 or greater.
Menace haste
[i]The Lionheart[/i] – Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, they gets +2/+2 for each creature blocking them.
[i]Demon Sword Mystletainn[/i] – Whenever another creature dies, put X +1/+1 counters on Eldigan, where X is that creature's power.
